amendment.description: An amendment numbered 88 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the use of federal funds for community-scale ambient air monitoring.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
